Summary: Like a aerodynamic yo-yo that had a spinning fan where the string would go.
divs: sighting detailsi was coming back from a date with one of my sister's friends named [cms\tg\pid]. we were stopped at a traffic light at 6 mile and beech daly rds. i looked to the east of us and saw the ship in really good detail it hovered at what seemed like an area near telegraph rd. which is 2 miles east. the craft was immense and you could see in the windows and see the fan which circled around the windows. from it's size and position it was approximately the size of a football stadium. i hovered for between 10-15 minutes and cars were just sopped in the road watching it. it made absolutely no noise. this was not just a light in the sky, i could actually see the details of the ship it's outer shell looked like it was a whitish metal and there were lights inside the area of the windows which went around the circumference of it. it then tilted up and went to the sky at a rate of speed unequaled by any craft known to man . it hoved in the night sky looking like a satellite the zig zagged at a high speed and went from sight . when i returned to my mother's house after i dropped the girl off i found that both my mother and sister had seen it also. my mother lives approx 1\2 mi. from where we viewed it. i first noticed the craft because it was enormous and seemed to be illuminated. my feelings at the time were of awe at such a marvel of technology. i at no time felt threatened by it, just lucky to have seen it.
